post:
Hello LET,

My name is Haris, from PieLayer, and I have several  offers for LowEndTalk readers.

**About us:**

PieLayer has opened its doors in 2012. We use modern hardware with an Intel Xeon E3, E5 CPU, 64-128GB of RAM, and SATA / SSDs in RAID 10 for both speed and redundancy. We have services available in various locations, including Germany and the US.


**NEW AUTUMN SALE OFFERS**

-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+- 

**Texas Super Solid 1 GB deal**

    1GB DDR3 RAM
    2 CPU cores
    15GB SSD Raid 10 space
    1000 GB traffic
    1000 Mbit uplink
    1x IPv4
    KVM/SolusVM
    Dallas, TX
    Coupon: TX1GB$4
    
    $4/month

We accept payment via PayPal, PerfectMoney, and Bitcoin. We have a 5-day refund policy ( valid only if there is hardware issue ). Additional IPv4 addresses are $1.75 per month; bulk pricing is available. For more information, have a read our [Terms of Service](http://pielayer.com/index.php/terms).
